snippet: European leaders on Monday endorsed an expansion of economic sanctions against Russia, but backed off putting the new measures into effect immediately.
abstract: European leaders endorse expansion of economic sanctions against Russia, but back off putting new measures into effect immediately; decision by European Union to stiffen measures over Ukraine comes as sporadic fighting disrupts Russian-backed cease-fire.

byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Kiev, Ukraine, and David M. Herszenhorn from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: European leaders on Monday endorsed an expansion of economic sanctions against Russia, but backed off putting the new measures into effect immediately.

headline.main: Brushing Off Threats, E.U. Votes to Toughen Its Sanctions on Russia
headline.print_headline: Brushing Off Threats, E.U. Votes to Toughen Its Sanctions on Russia

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations
